name: Sunrise
description: Sunrise is the base layer for Interliquid Networks Sunrise integrates Data Availability layer and Liquidity Hub functions into a single platform powered by Proof-of-Liquidity — enabling sovereign rollups and leading L1s like Ethereum and Solana to connect seamlessly through deep, shared liquidity. Sunrise isn't "just" a DA layer—its business model captures value at three distinct points of every on-chain activity, delivering robust yield and sustainable protocol growth. The protocol generates revenue through three channels: transaction fees, swap fees in the liquidity pool, and MEV capture.
